set.if:
ctx.event?.code != null &&
["5140", "5145"].contains(ctx.event.code) &&
ctx.winlog?.event_data?.ShareName != null &&
ctx.winlog?.event_data?.ShareName != "" &&
ctx.file?.name != null

set.value: Processor "{{ _ingest.on_failure_processor_type }}" with tag "{{ _ingest.on_failure_processor_tag }}" in pipeline "{{ _ingest.on_failure_pipeline }}" failed with message "{{ _ingest.on_failure_message }}"

config.description: Final pipeline for processing all incoming Fleet Agent documents.

set.description: Add time when event was ingested.

script.description: Remove sub-seconds from event.ingested to improve storage efficiency.
script.source: ctx.event.ingested = ctx.event.ingested.withNano(0).format(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME);

script.description: Add event.agent_id_status based on the API key metadata and the agent.id contained in the event.

set.value: Processor "{{ _ingest.on_failure_processor_type }}" with tag "{{ _ingest.on_failure_processor_tag }}" in pipeline "{{ _ingest.on_failure_pipeline }}" failed with message "{{ _ingest.on_failure_message }}"

set.description: If '@timestamp' is missing, set it with the ingest timestamp

rename.description: Rename process.ppid from Agent 7.x to process.parent.pid.

set.description: Set any extracted text on the 'body' field
